title: Stock Review for Cigarettes Investors -- Altria, British American Tobacco, Philip Morris, and Vector
text:
NEW YORK, March 9, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on MO, BTI, PM, and VGR which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . WallStEquities.com revisits the Tobacco industry, which comprises those persons and companies that are engaged in the growth, preparation for sale, shipment, advertisement, and distribution of tobacco and tobacco-related products. Four stocks in the Cigarettes space have been selected for review, and they are Altria Group Inc. (NYSE: MO), British American Tobacco PLC (NYSE: BTI), Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE: PM), and Vector Group Ltd (NYSE: VGR). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Altria Group
On Thursday, shares in Richmond, Virginia headquartered Altria Group Inc. recorded a trading volume of 6.33 million shares. The stock ended the day at $65.43, rising 2.12% from the last trading session. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 3.69%. Furthermore, shares of Altria, which through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cigarettes, smokeless products, and wine in the US, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 50.06.
On March 01 st , 2018, Altria announced that its Board of Directors voted to increase the Company's regular quarterly dividend by 6.1% to $0.70 per common share versus the previous rate of $0.66 per common share. The quarterly dividend is payable on April 10 th , 2018, to shareholders of record as of March 15 th , 2018. The ex-dividend date is March 14 th , 2018. Get the full research report on MO for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=MO
British American Tobacco
London, the UK headquartered British American Tobacco PLC's stock climbed 1.35%, finishing yesterday's session at $59.30. A total volume of 2.35 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 1.86 million shares. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 8.95%. Additionally, shares of the Company which engages in the production and sale of tobacco products, have an RSI of 37.96.
On February 28 th , 2018, research firm Citigroup downgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Buy' to 'Neutral'. Get access to our top-rated research, including the free report on BTI at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BTI
Philip Morris International
Shares in New York headquartered Philip Morris International Inc. ended the session 1.97% higher at $109.00. The stock recorded a trading volume of 3.97 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 8.64% in the last month and 3.36% over the previous three months. The stock is trading 3.88% above its 50-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Philip Morris, which through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cigarettes, other tobacco products, and other nicotine-containing products, have an RSI of 61.59.
On February 16 th , 2018, Philip Morris (PM) was recognized for the second year in a row as a Global Top Employer. This year's certification from the Top Employer Institute is awarded to PM teams in 44 countries. The Company has been recognized by the Top Employer Institute for six consecutive years.
On February 28 th , 2018, research firm Citigroup upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Neutral' to 'Buy'. Click here to subscribe for a free membership which welcomes you with our report on PM at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=PM
Vector Group
Miami, Florida-based At the closing bell on Thursday, Vector Group Ltd's stock rose 1.25%, finishing at $21.00. A total volume of 658,086 shares was traded. The Company's shares have gained 2.54% in the last month and 4.40% over the past year. The stock is trading 0.49% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Vector, which through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cigarettes in the US, have an RSI of 57.83.
On March 05 th , 2018, Vector announced that it has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend on the Company's common stock of $0.40 per share. The quarterly cash dividend will be payable on March 29 th , 2018, to holders of record as of March 20 th , 2018.
